title: Yours Sincerely
description: The sequel to Amber Allure's Best Seller Pushing The For His Eyes Only...Scott has one sincere wish that he really hopes Joe will help him fulfill. He wants to be spanked--properly.He doesn't want any half-measures made because he's a novice submissive, no gentle little taps on the backside. Scott wants the real thing. Maybe even more than that, he needs to know that Joe truly believes he's capable of handling whatever his lover wants to dish out.When Joe receives Scott's note, he's more than happy to oblige. In fact, he's been waiting for the opportunity to discover if his submissive might also a masochist. Now it's time for them both to find out for sure... Gay / Contemporary / BDSM / Series
author: Kim Dare
